snippet.title: The Devil Hired Me To Buy Your Soul - Knock, Traveling Soulsman (Free Game)
snippet.description:
Knock Knock Gameplay
Part 1: https://youtu.be/Ko1RbkeVVhE

Chat with Falcon on Twitter - https://twitter.com/YKYMisterFalcon
Support Falcon with Tips - https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=DXC2DEQVZ2KZS

- - - -

Recommended Gameplay:

▶ Yuppie Psycho: https://youtu.be/Ij8ILYp-5nE

▶ Infected Shelter: https://youtu.be/pUIxDH3XMAg

▶ Border Officer: https://youtu.be/ahspdslECE4

▶ Talk To Strangers: https://youtu.be/oKxhGJkOMPQ

▶ World War Z: https://youtu.be/OVGO0km9oeI

▶ My Summer Car: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wGrmGu5FFzc&list=PLENba4NF0eFTOR_z5J1w1O-U7RCWBK-ki

▶ Dealer's Life: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BUvIy2x_2Pk&list=PLENba4NF0eFSQTWCoBoTd3FnKg2oqpSAc

▶ Thief Simulator: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RFphZkXFwfI&list=PLENba4NF0eFR-O6Dx6-sN9nuKgGdvl0Vv

▶ Hobo Tough Life: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fKOADuy6lGI&list=PLENba4NF0eFTFHOAnC6RFqZ8OfrqKvozK

▶ State of Decay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZbeGgedo-PQ&list=PLENba4NF0eFSVT8JzbXTaPgKO-wqJ8R6I

▶ Zombotron 2019: https://youtu.be/qpqWR-np9VQ

▶ Little Misfortune: https://youtu.be/c9gUhX0cBxc

- - - -

Let's Play Knock Knock the Traveling Soulsman 2019 Gameplay Walkthrough! A free game for Ludum Dare 44.

In "Knock Knock", you play Dave Hill, a little silly Travelling Sellsman in souls stuff at the service of the devil and your goal is to keep your job by succeeding the ultimatum that Satan has given you.
You will have to collect more souls than Rodrique the stone by going to propose the best wishes to the humans against a super mega pact ultra cool.

Knock Knock the Traveling Soulsman Download - https://angrysquirrels.itch.io/ld44-knock-knock-traveling-soulsman

#knockknock #indie #simulation #gaming
